attributes.action: The Government should andmust introduce compulsory testing.
attributes.additional_details: The Government must introduce compulsory testing for covid19 for every adult in the UK and found he/she must be tagged to be tracked. Since the start of this pandemic we have been using rudimentary method by just identifying  flu/cold symptoms.
attributes.background: To introduce compulsory testing for covid 19 for every adult in the UK. Tag individuals who a found with covid19 instead of depending  on flu and cold symptoms  to determine whether someone is infected. Its a rudimentary method we are currently  using to determine covid19 victims.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling for the Governemnt to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
